data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Amroha, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Amroha, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 20,242 believers in Amroha, Uttar Pradesh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Amroha, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 20,242 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,819,958 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Brahmin Sanadhya people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Amroha, Uttar Pradesh, India.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Amroha. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the county of Amroha, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,840,200.

We estimate Amroha has 20,242 people who might know Jesus, 22,328 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,797,630 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Amroha that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.
